source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video is a close-up shot focusing on a tomato positioned in the center foreground. A hose with a nozzle extends from the bottom center of the frame, aiming a thin, high-pressure water jet vertically through the tomato. In the middle ground, directly behind the tomato, the out-of-focus head and shoulders of a man are visible. The background consists of green trees. The water jet slices upward through the tomato, causing water and pulp to spray out from the top. As the cut progresses, the top half of the tomato begins to separate and lift away from the bottom half. The camera remains static and at the subject's level throughout the action.
